name: Epic Platformer cuz yes [BETA]
description:
Small little platformer game that is currently in beta. Only 4 levels that are moderate difficulty. Planning to add some more updates in the future; bosses, more enemies, more levels.

Version - 1.1

If you have any suggestions or bugs to report, join the discord server: https://discord.gg/6G8GD7rZ3H

That's it for now...
